CommandDefinition.Name: exportproperties
CommandDefinition.Description: Exports Xyna Properties to a file.

Argument.Name: format
Argument.Description: The format of the export (one of: CSV, YAML), default: CSV

Argument.Name: filter
Argument.Description: Filter string to be matched, using a regular expression

BoolOption.Name: inclUnchanged
BoolOption.Description: Include Properties with a default value and no specified value that overrides it

BoolOption.Name: inclDoc
BoolOption.Description: Include the documentation in all available languages in the export
